segments.text: I see the woman at the sink, completely unaware of the chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflows the sink in a relentless stream, creating a small lake at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on polishing that plate, as if nothing else matters in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how her foot is already soaked, but she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's both fascinating and alarming to watch her in such a peaceful state while disaster unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, mischievous as ever, are completely absorbed in their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They live in a world where rules donâ€™t apply, where risk is just a thrill to chase.
segments.speaker: PAR
